title: Age of Forgotten Empires (Expansion of AoE II)
description:
Hello RTS lover of the late 90s and early 2000. 

Here is the latest gift for you. An official expansion pack for AoE II after almost a decade!! 

Welcome to 

Age of Empires II: Forgotten Empires,
the mod that turned into an official expansion to the evergreen RTS classic, Age of Empires II.

Installation is easy: 

*Unzip the file into your Age of Empires II Installation folder (typically C:Program FilesMicrosoft GamesAge of Empires II)

*Go to the /age2_x1 subfolder and run Fixaofe.exe

*Run age2_x2.exe to play!

If you are playing my Direct Play Version, (here: http://thepiratebay.ac/torrent/7661004/Age_Of_Empire-II__Expansion_%5BDirect_Play%5D)

* Unzip in the game folder. 
* Open Age2_x1 folder.
* Double click FixAoFE and click Apply. 
* Double click age2_x2 to play.

Go to Custom Campaign to find the new campaigns. Adjust settings as you need. 

If Any warning shows, ignore it. Tested in Windows XP and Linux.

For not to:
1. Say Thanks.
2. More importantly, keep seeding after you download. 

Cheers!!
